choices.B: Insert the syntax <?if:VENDOR_NAME=’COMPANY A’?> before the Supplier field on the template. Then, enter the <?end if?> tag after the invoices table.
choices.C: Hard code Supplier Name "Company A" in the report template and only invoices for that supplier will be displayed.
choices.D: Insert the syntax <?if:condition?> before the Supplier field and then enter the closing tag </<? if:condition?>.
choices.A: Insert the syntax <?if:’COMPANY A’?> before the Supplier field and then enter the closing tag </<?if:COMPANY A?> after the invoices table.

questions.question_text:
You want to customize the Payables Invoice Register template to only display invoices when the Supplier name is Company A. Supplier name is a group that repeats on every page.
Which is the correct way to customize the template?

choices.A: An accounting entry has been created for the invoice.
choices.C: The invoice was adjusted by a credit or a debit memo.
choices.B: Prepayments were applied to the invoice.
choices.E: The invoice is fully or partially paid.

questions.question_text: Identify three scenarios where you are not allowed to cancel an invoice.

choices.B: Standard, Credit Memo, and Invoice Request
choices.D: Standard, Debit Memo and Customer Refund
choices.C: Standard, Credit Memo and Customer Refund
choices.A: Standard, Credit Memo and Debit Memo

questions.question_text: Which invoice types can be included in the Create Payment flow?
Which three attributes are captured during the scanning of invoice images?

discussion.content:
The batches are sent to Oracle Forms Recognition for intelligent data recognition and extraction of the following key invoice header attributes: PO number, supplier, invoice number, invoice amount, invoice date, customer taxpayer ID, and business unit. The extracted attributes are later prepopulated directly into the invoice entry user interface.

https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E36909_01/fusionapps.1111/e20375/F569958AN60E65.htm

choices.D: company segment, cost center segment, supplier, and Attribute 1 on the invoice line
choices.A: company and cost center segment only
choices.B: cost center segment and supplier only

questions.question_text: Which attributes on the payables invoice can be used during approval rule creation?

discussion.content: D. company segment, cost center segment, supplier, and Attribute 1 on the invoice line
